name: p4-analyzer-vscode
description: P4 language support for Visual Studio Code

p4-analyzer.server.absoluteServerPath.markdownDescription:
Specifies the absolute path to a P4 Analyzer server executable.

If a path is not specified, then the integrated WebAssembly based server is used by default.

p4-analyzer.server.logPath.markdownDescription:
The optional `'--logpath'` argument to supply to the P4 Analyzer server executable.

Used only in conjunction with *Absolute Server Path*.

p4-analyzer.server.logLevel.markdownDescription:
The optional `'--loglevel'` argument to supply to the P4 Analyzer server executable.

Used only in conjunction with *Absolute Server Path*.

enumDescriptions: Trace message and additional trace properties
p4-analyzer.trace.server.description: Specifies the Trace setting of the P4 Analyzer (this is usually overly verbose and not recommended for regular use).
